Package org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.transaction

Interface BasicSignatureComputationData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SignatureComputationData<BasicSignatureComputationData>
    public interface BasicSignatureComputationData
extends SignatureComputationData<BasicSignatureComputationData>
    Contains the input/output data of the FreeTransactionManager.prepareComputeSignature(SignatureComputationData) method for basic signature computation using the "Data Cipher" command.

    An instance of this interface can be obtained via the method LegacySamApiFactory.createBasicSignatureComputationData().

    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.eclipse.keypop.calypso.crypto.legacysam.transaction.SignatureComputationData

        getSignature, setData, setKeyDiversifier, setSignatureSize
